intro: Brachyscome lyrifolia, commonly known as the silver leaf daisy, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It is characterized by its silver-gray leaves and bright yellow flowers that bloom in spring. The plant belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers. It thrives in well-drained soils and full sun, making it a popular choice for rock gardens and coastal landscapes. Its ornamental value is enhanced by its compact growth habit and long-lasting blooms.
